Reviews.Title: “A very nice hotel in a rejuvenated area of downtown LA”

Reviews.Content: stayed night 11th floor pleased overall experience arrived hotel greeted friendly staff checkin process breeze key time pleasant walk surprised spacious sized flat screen tv refrigerator iron bed comfortable easy fall asleep ac unit perfect terms noise quiet definitely won’t light sleeper bathroom plenty space easily accommodate multiple people didn’t buy internet package fairly pricy day found able charging internet usage hotel gone recently internet access free tried breakfast lobby pleased offer hungry eating breakfast hotel overall pleased stay jw marriott la live ultimately disappointed don’t offer free internet service
